vulns.details: An XXE issue in SAXBuilder in JDOM through 2.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request.  At this time there is not released fixed version of JDOM.  As a workaround, to avoid external entities being expanded, one can call `builder.setExpandEntities(false)` and they won't be expanded.
vulns.summary: XML External Entity (XXE) Injection in JDOM
